Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your highest expectations. This exceptional item boasts a multitude of features that are sure to enhance your daily life or business operations significantly. Given its unparalleled quality and functionality, we believe it is worth more than $12000 to you. However, to make this opportunity even more appealing, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $15000. This represents an excellent value considering the investment you will receive in return. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer. Kind regards, Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
